topic_description: Education and Jobs research focuses on how AI and technology transform learning experiences and workforce dynamics. This field investigates intelligent tutoring systems, personalized learning, skill assessment, career guidance, and the future of work. Researchers explore adaptive educational technologies, automated grading systems, learning analytics, and methods to prepare individuals for evolving job markets while addressing challenges in accessibility, equity, and effective human-AI collaboration in educational settings.
